sentence.Network_en: The column was formed integrally within a relatively rigid frame.
sentence.Network_cn: 柱子与一个具备相当刚性的框架形成整体.

sentence.Network_en: All elements of the organic whole were integrally linked as expressions of an irreducible essence.
sentence.Network_cn: 有机整体的一切要素作为不能化简的本质而结成一体.

sentence.Network_en: The evaporator is integrally hot galvanized, never rusty with long life.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒸发器整体热浸锌, 永不生锈,使用寿命长.
